title: #247 - Jamie Kennedy, Stu Stone, & ME
description:
Comedian & Actor Jamie Kennedy, along with his best friend, Actor, Rapper, & Filmmaker Stu Stone stop by the Mancave to celebrate a big day for Jamie.  We open a bottle of Champagne, a bottle of Titos, drink, and talk about Jamie booking a movie, we realize I almost got in a fight with Stu & his friend 17 years ago, we talk hip hop, & we watch my favorite episode of their show BLOWIN' UP where they dress up like two black men and perform in front of the 36 Mafia's fans.

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron to get Three Free MEALS w/ Free Shipping go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

 

This Podcast is also brought to you by BEACHBODY ON DEMAND – to claim a free trail membership TEXT [Bert] to 303030 and get full access to this entire platform for free!

This podcast is also brought to you by DOLLAR SHAVE CLUB go to: https://try.dollarshaveclub.com/5-dollar-bundle/?utm_medium=pod&utm_source=veri&utm_campaign=&utm_content=bertcast and enter the code word “BERTCAST”
